roleset.name: to fasten, attach
roleset.note: HITCH-V NOTES: Frames file for 'hitch' based on survey of sentences in the WSJ corpus. (from hitch.01-v predicate notes)

example.name: all arguments
example.text: Nissan Motor is just one of a slew of advertisers that [*T*-1] have hitched their ads to the devastating San Francisco quake and Hurricane Hugo .
example.arg: to the devastating San Francisco quake and Hurricane Hugo
